work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Analysis, design and evaluation of a restaurant recommendation platform for people with food allergies. Research based on a Participatory Design methodology: (1) interviewed in detail people living with food allergies and analyzed the results with the thematic analysis method; (2) created low-fidelity prototypes using the Quant-UX prototyping tool and (3) tested the usability of the prototype with end-users.
